page.title: 17A Birthday Party
page.content: I was going to Andrew's birthday party. I wrapped his present then went to his house.I got him a trickshifter and he got numbers up from Martin and from Paul he got a bar of chocolate and a photo album.When everyone was ready we went to the Wimpy.Martin, Andrew and I had a cheese burger and chips and a coke.After we had a knicker bocker glory we all went back to Andrews house.We went up stairs to play.After a while we went to Chatsworth park to play football we had a brillant time the score was 5 all.After all the games we had the cake it had a football pitch on it then we had a mars bar each and a balloon to take home. Sonu Gupta age 10
